text: haey banda anak del mean chomnue niyeay tha hetoavei ban chea ke min banhchouh chompouk( bangkeab aoy puok yeung thveusangkream)? te nowpel del chompouk da chbasaleasa trauv ban ke banhchouh ning batobanhchea thveusangkream trauv ban ke romluk nowknong vea noh anak nung bankheunh puok del mean chomngu knong chetd robsa puokke( puok poutatbot) samlung meul anak( mou ham meat) dauch chea kar samlung meul robsa anak del chitaslab daoysaar phyokhlach champoh sechakdeislab der . dau che neah cheakearola brasaer samreab puokke
